channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken Steps, 27th August
item.description:
I am writing to raise a concern about the cracked and damaged steps located at DoubleTree Hilton. I recently fell while using these steps, and I am very concerned about the risk they pose to the public. In addition to the cracks, the black grip covering does not extend across the full width of each step. This makes them particularly unsafe, especially during icier or wet periods when there is a much higher chance of slipping. If an elderly person, child, or anyone with mobility difficulties were to fall here, the consequences could be extremely serious. I kindly ask that this issue is treated as a matter of urgency and that the steps are properly repaired and made safe as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 265A, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp too bright, 27th August
item.description:
You installed a new street directly outside our house. Not only was it moved about 2 foot it is much taller than the old lamp and the light is shining directly into our bedroom and we are having problems sleeping. Please can a light shield be attached. Many thanks
